name: p6-fisheye

scripts.build: postcss ./css/home.css -u autoprefixer cssnano -o ./build/home.min.css && postcss ./css/photographers.css -u autoprefixer cssnano -o ./build/photographers.min.css && uglifyjs ./scripts/api/Api.js -o ./build/Api.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/factories/MediaFactory.js -o ./build/MediaFactory.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/pages/Home.js -o ./build/Home.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/pages/Photographer.js -o ./build/Photographer.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/ArticleTemplate.js -o ./build/ArticleTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/FilterTemplate.js -o ./build/FilterTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/HeaderTemplate.js -o ./build/HeaderTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/HomeTemplate.js -o ./build/HomeTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/LightBoxTemplate.js -o ./build/LightBoxTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/ModalTemplate.js -o ./build/ModalTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/templates/TotalTemplate.js -o ./build/TotalTemplate.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/utils/Filter.js -o ./build/Filter.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/utils/LightBox.js -o ./build/LightBox.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/utils/Likes.js -o ./build/Likes.min.js && uglifyjs ./scripts/utils/Modal.js -o ./build/Modal.min.js
